content.rendered:
Experience our

RestroBar

Kings Club Restrobar is an astounding place for casual or formal dining where you can enjoy a unwind evening with your friends & family away from the noise and crowds of regular lounges. It’s perfectly blending modern & luxurious design with subtle lighting comes with a packed bar with a comprehensive array of exotic cocktails & classic drinks.
When you unwind & relish the ambience, the food, and pleasant music, Kings Club Restrobar is one such place in Bangalore that provides the whole package. It is placed in an attractive colorful outdoor setting with retro music playing all along in the background that adds a comfy & welcoming touch to the ambiance. It serves an immersive variety of regional flavors from different parts of the country inclusive of exotic drinks.
We provide a multiple variety of options for guests/members looking for special event venues in Bangalore with an exclusive feel. We have ample spaces available for private and semi-private that can be separated off on the basis of your requirements. We provide custom-designed food & beverage packages for special occasions and parties featuring everything from light bites and shared plates to hand-crafted cocktails.
Whether you are planning to relish a formal dinner or you are keen to dance the night away, we can put together a luxurious feast or a bar menu to temp the taste buds. Kings Club Restobar has its own catering services served by top-notch Chefs that provide a first-class gourmet food experience to make your event special. We serve vegetarian as well as non-vegetarian cuisines.

Features & Amenities

Kings Club Restrobar is well-known for its flair for services. Here are the features of Kings Club Restrobar:
  • A stay in amazing Restrobar is always a special time.
  • It features all the amenities and services of a luxury 5-star hotel coupled with gorgeous attraction
  • Unique feel-at-home atmosphere.
  • You can also find an extensive choice of desserts that add to the overall dining experience.
  • Quality food
  • Great service at an affordable price point.

Here are the amenities of Kings Club Restrobar:

  • Private entrance with dedicated elevator
  • Outdoor and indoor spaces
  • Retractable roof structures
  • Candlelight Lounge
  • Large Screen TVs
  • State of the Art Sound & AV system
  • DJ equipment
  • Dance Lights

Private entrance with dedicated elevator

Outdoor and indoor spaces

Retractable roof structures

Delight mouth-watering dishes with perfect beverage in classy ambiance!!

Types of Events You Can Host

Are you looking for a unique baby shower venue? Are you on the search for a glorious birthday party space? Do you need an ideal Restrobar venue? Nestled in the vicinity of Malathalli Lake, Kings Club Restrobar offers the perfect backdrop for celebrating special events in style. We provide sweeping city views in a luxurious setting & cater to all types of events.

Birthday party

Anniversary celebrations

Social gatherings or events

Personal events or functions

Please wait while flipbook is loading. For more related info, FAQs and issues please refer to DearFlip WordPress Flipbook Plugin Help documentation.

Types of Cuisines

Previous
Next
Kings Club Restrobar offers tempting delights to entice guests/members. This Restrobar is an excellent destination to enjoy twilight dining and late night mingling. The menu at Kings Club Restrobar encapsulates a variety of famous dishes from all types of cuisines.
Indulge in ingenious appetizing experiences & dive into a world of flavors!!

About Chef & Staffs

Gopal


Kings Club Sky Restrobar has highly trained chefs that cook world-class buffets, multi-cuisines for its esteemed members. Our chefs have engineered the menu whether be it starters, main course & platters or dessert. We an expert team of chefs with high standards of hygiene offer excellent food services.

Kings Club Restrobar offers a peaceful atmosphere, classy ambiance that is meant to light up your soul and space to indulge in your favorite activities. You need not to look out for any other place for scrumptious food & beverages.
